amendment.description: To provide a definition of rural Utah for the purposes of the environmental assistance program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1702 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1702 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11540) To provide a definition of rural Utah for the purposes of the environmental assistance program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1702 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1702 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Bennett.
